content.text:
HON. MICHAEL K. SIMPSON

                                of idaho

                    in the house of representatives

                        Friday, November 3, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. SIMPSON. Mr. Speaker, on Roll Call No. 604 I was absent on 
account of personal reasons. Had I been present, I would have voted 
aye.
content.speaker: Mr. SIMPSON
